remediations_applied.remediation: Created EVID-0013 (PR cycle time) and EVID-0014 (defect recurrence). Linked to REQ-0007.
Linked EVID-0013 to MET-0006 and EVID-0014 to MET-0007. Added quantified targets.

remediations_applied.description: Success metrics use aspirational language without quantified thresholds
remediations_applied.remediation: Added quantified targets with timelines and confidence intervals to MET-0001 through MET-0007.

remediations_applied.description: Escalation mechanism for pack misses undefined
remediations_applied.remediation: Defined EscalationPolicy artifact kind with authority_role, escalation_criteria, escalation_ttl, audit_event_type. Created EVID-0015. Added AC-0003-05 to REQ-0003.

remediations_applied.description: RSK-0002 and RSK-0004 analyzed independently without unified criteria
remediations_applied.remediation: Created TRADEOFF-0001 with unified criteria ranking, quantified thresholds, Pareto configurations, and coordinated mitigation strategy.

remediations_applied.description: G-0003 vs G-0007 express conflicting enforcement models
remediations_applied.remediation: Adopted graduated model: G-0003 transitions from defect-emitting to denied per TRADEOFF-0001; G-0007 trends to zero during transition, reaches zero upon full enforcement.
Added CAC-STAGE-09 and feedback_loop specification with aggregation triggers, pack review cadence, SLA, and metrics.

remediations_applied.description: Bootstrap recovery path undefined for deadlock scenario
remediations_applied.remediation: Added recovery_procedure to CNS-0006: bootstrap-safe mode, pre-upgrade check, rollback compatibility matrix, emergency override with dual-signoff.

remediations_applied.description: Alternative interventions not ruled out for failure modes
remediations_applied.remediation: Added alternative_interventions and cac_superiority to each failure mode. Added yagni_analysis with deferrable and non-deferrable features.

remediations_applied.description: Dependency trust boundary attack vector via stable_id resolution timing
remediations_applied.remediation: Added dependency_review_hash field to context_pack.spec. Added SEC-CTRL-0010, SEC-CTRL-0011, SEC-PROP-0006 for trust boundary protection.

strategic_recommendations_addressed: STRAT-001: Feedback loop now explicit with DefectRecord aggregation and pack spec review
STRAT-002: Metrics now have quantified thresholds and statistical tests

verdict_reason: All 10 council findings from prior review have been remediated. Gates re-evaluated and all pass. PRD is ready for RFC transition.
